document_data.name: Curious Past
document_data.location: [[Street of Silks]], [[Castle Ward of Waterdeep|Castle Ward]], [[Waterdeep]]
document_data.mainbody: The '''Curious Past''' was the antiquities store of [[Bronwyn Caradoon]] in the city of [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Location: This store fronted the [[Street of Silks]] from the east, in the [[Waterdeep/Castle Ward|Castle Ward]] of Waterdeep.
document_data.Services: The shop dealt in exotic items of fairly dubious legality while also being a front for [[Harper]] activity.
